text:
Douglas Lawrence "Doug" Osowski (born January 1, 1969) mostly known as Mr. Lawrence or Doug Lawrence, is an American voice actor, comedian, writer, storyboard artist, animator, and director. He is known for his voice roles such as Plankton, Larry the Lobster, and the Realistic Fish Head in "Spongebob Squarepants".
Lawrence was born in East Brunswick Township, New Jersey on January 1, 1969.
